name: Hellish Fishing
description:
Fishing game prototype created with Unreal Engine 4.
Gameplay based on the fishing minigame from Stardew Valley.

Instructions:
Move character with WASD and camera with the mouse.
When in fishing mode use W/S to move the widget up and down.
The goal is to fill the red bar in the right of the widget, to do it keep the fish inside the widget.

We do not own any of the animations or the assets from the game.
We used animations from Mixamo and the Infinity Blade: Fire Lands asset pack from Unreal Marketplace.

Created by: Pau Sánchez Cairó and Josep Franqueza Martí
